rooms.description: Accessible entrance hall with a wide door and ramps for wheelchair accessibility. The space is designed in an Art Deco style with geometric patterns, streamlined furniture and metallic accents.
Open living room area with a large window facing the north for ample natural light and a view of the garden. Art Deco elements like bold geometric designs and reflective surfaces are incorporated.
Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room. Features a minimalist Art Deco design with polished surfaces and metallic finishes, ensuring easy wheelchair movement.
Fully accessible kitchen with modern amenities designed in Art Deco style using streamlined cabinetry and reflective finishes. Layout ensures minimal obstructions for wheelchair access.
Accessible bathroom featuring a roll-in shower, grab bars and other safety features, designed with Art Deco motifs for aesthetics.

openings.description: The main entrance facing north to align with Vastu principles and ensure ample natural light. Designed as a wheelchair-accessible entry point.
Large north-facing window in the living room to enhance natural light and provide views of the garden. Adheres to Art Deco style with streamlined frames.
Door opening leading directly to the garden from the living area for seamless integration with outdoor space. Includes a ramp for wheelchair accessibility.
Secondary entrance/back door providing additional access to the garden or service areas. Ensures compliance with accessibility standards.

garden.description: Large garden space with diverse plantings and pathways designed for easy wheelchair access. Incorporates Art Deco landscaping elements such as geometric hardscaping and reflective water features.
